getType

public int getType()
Description copied from interface: Button
Retrieve the type of the button. Pushbutton will deliver true==getState() as long as they are pressed down. Togglebuttons will change their state once they are pressed and keep that state until they are pressed again.

Specified by:
getType in interface Button
Returns:
[ PUSHBUTTON | TOGGLEBUTTON ]
